content: We use the Device resource for historical implantable devices. We need a recorded on date/time and procedure date/time but see that neither exist in the Device resource. We plan to add a custom extension for both and add a search parameter for the recorded on date/time. Is there a reason neither of these dates are already in the Device resource? Are we using the wrong resource for historical implantable devices?
Device is information about the device itself. You would normally use Procedure to hold info about a historical implantation

Well that explains a lot and makes sense. Once we add a record in Procedure (and reference the Device using Procedure.focalDevice.manipulated) we still have an issue needing a recorded on date/time, but this gets us further along. Thank you @David Pyke
You'll have meta.lastUpdated. You also have Provenance. Other than that, you may need an extension
James Dinsmore has marked this topic as resolved.
